info.name: Bedelia API - Previas & Posprevias
info.description:
Complete API collection for Bedelia prerequisites (previas) and dependents (posprevias) system.

This collection includes endpoints for:
- Plans and Materias (basic queries)
- Previas (prerequisites for courses)
- Posprevias (courses that depend on a given course)

Use the Bedelia Environment to set base_url and plan IDs.

item.name: 1. Plans & Materias (Basic)

request.description:
Get all plans de estudio. Can be filtered by year (anio) or name (nombre_carrera).

Query parameters:
- anio: Filter by year (e.g., 2021)
- nombre_carrera: Filter by career name (partial match)
Filter plans by year. Example shows plans from 2021.

query.description: Search in nombre_carrera, anio, or descripcion

request.description:
Search plans by career name, year, or description.

Query parameters:
- nombre_carrera: Filter by career name (exact match)
- anio: Filter by year (exact match)
- activo: Filter by active status (true/false)
- search: Search in nombre_carrera, anio, or descripcion

Get details of a specific plan de estudio by UUID.

Returns detailed information including materias_count.

Get all materias (courses/subjects) in the system.

Query parameters:
- codigo: Filter by materia code
- nombre: Filter by materia name (partial match)
- page_size: Results per page
Search for a specific materia by code. Example: 1944 (ADMINISTRACION GENERAL PARA INGENIEROS)

query.description: Search in codigo or nombre fields

request.description:
Search materias by code or name using the search parameter.

Query parameters:
- codigo: Filter by materia code (exact match)
- activo: Filter by active status (true/false)
- search: Search in codigo or nombre fields

Get detailed information about a specific materia by UUID.

Returns detailed information including unidades (approvable units) and planes_count.

item.name: List PlanMaterias - Materias in a Plan

request.description:
Get all materias that belong to a specific plan.

Query parameters:
- plan: UUID of the plan (filterset field)
- materia: UUID of the materia (filterset field)
- activo: Filter by active status (true/false)
- search: Search by plan name, plan year, materia code, or materia name

query.description: Search in plan__nombre_carrera, plan__anio, materia__codigo, or materia__nombre

request.description:
Search PlanMaterias by plan name, plan year, materia code, or materia name.

Example: Search for all PlanMaterias containing materia code 1944.

Get detailed information about a specific PlanMateria relationship by UUID.

Returns detailed information including plan and materia details.

query.description: Search by materia code or name (searches materia__codigo, materia__nombre, codigo_bedelias, nombre)

request.description:
Get unidades aprobables (approvable units) for a materia.

Unidad tipos:
- CURSO: Course
- EXAMEN: Exam
- UCB: UCB Module
- OTRO: Other

Query parameters:
- materia: Filter by materia UUID (exact match)
- tipo: Filter by unit type (CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO)
- activo: Filter by active status (true/false)
- search: Search by materia code, materia name, codigo_bedelias, or nombre

item.name: List Unidades Aprobables - Filter by Tipo

query.description: Filter by unit type: CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO
Search by materia code or name

request.description:
Get unidades aprobables filtered by type and materia code.

Example: Get CURSO units for materia 1944.

Get detailed information about a specific unidad aprobable by UUID.

Returns detailed information including materia details.

item.description: Basic endpoints for querying plans, materias, and related entities.

item.name: 2. Previas (Prerequisites)
Get Previas - By Plan ID & Materia Code

query.description: Type: CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, or OTRO

request.description:
Get prerequisites (previas) for a specific materia in a plan.

This is the PRIMARY method using plan_id.

Example: Prerequisites for CURSO of materia 1944 in INGENIERÍA CIVIL 2021

Required parameters:
- plan_id: UUID of the plan
- materia_code: Code of the materia
- unidad_tipo: Type of unit (CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO)

Optional parameters:
- activo: Filter by active status (true/false)

item.name: Get Previas - By Plan Year/Name & Materia Code

query.description: Type: CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, or OTRO

request.description:
Get prerequisites using plan year and name instead of UUID.

This is an ALTERNATIVE method when you don't have the plan_id.

Example: Prerequisites for EXAMEN of materia 1944 in INGENIERÍA EN COMPUTACIÓN 1997

Required parameters:
- plan_year: Year of the plan
- plan_name: Name of the career (case-insensitive partial match)
- materia_code: Code of the materia
- unidad_tipo: Type of unit (CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO)

Get prerequisites filtered by active status.

Use the 'activo' parameter to filter:
- activo=true: Only active materias
- activo=false: Only inactive materias

item.name: Get Previas - By Plan Materia ID

query.description: UUID of the PlanMateria (identifies both plan and materia)
Type: CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, or OTRO

request.description:
Get prerequisites using PlanMateria ID directly.

This method is useful when you already have the PlanMateria UUID.

Required parameters:
- plan_materia_id: UUID of the PlanMateria
- unidad_tipo: Type of unit

item.description: Endpoints for querying prerequisites (previas) - what courses are required before taking a given course.

item.name: 3. Posprevias (Dependents)
Get Posprevias - By Plan Materia ID

request.description:
Get posprevias (dependent courses) - courses that require this course as a prerequisite.

This shows 'what courses can I take after completing this one'.

Required parameters:
- plan_materia_id: UUID of the PlanMateria

Optional parameters:
- unidad_tipo: Filter by unit type (CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO)
- activo: Filter by active status

Get posprevias using materia code and plan ID.

Required parameters:
- plan_id: UUID of the plan
- plan_materia_code: Code of the materia

Optional parameters:
- unidad_tipo: Filter by unit type
- activo: Filter by active status

item.name: Get Posprevias - By Plan Year/Name & Materia Code

request.description:
Get posprevias using plan year/name and materia code.

Alternative method when you don't have plan_id.

Required parameters:
- plan_year: Year of the plan
- plan_name: Name of the career
- plan_materia_code: Code of the materia

item.description: Endpoints for querying posprevias (dependents) - what courses require a given course as a prerequisite.
